attributes.action:
Abolish the mandatory Foreign Aid Target.
Spend OUR money at home.
attributes.additional_details: We call upon the Government to abolish the mandatory 0.7% GDP target and focus its priorities on defence, armed forces and our. homeless veterans
attributes.background:
We believe it is time our Government got its priorities right and abolished the mandatory Foreign Aid budget target.
When we have homeless veterans sleeping on our streets, it is wrong to spend over £14bn a year on Foreign Aid.
We should be looking after people who fought for their country.
